user.description: Please enter username and password that you use to connect with the NetHome Plus mobile application.
user.title: Sign-in with Midea app account

unreachable_appliance.description:
We were unable to discover an appliance called {name} with the id {id} on the local network.

If you know appliance's IPv4 address, please enter it below to add it to Home Assistant.

You can also provide token and key if you have them. If not, we will obtain them from Midea cloud.
unreachable_appliance.title: Appliance IPv4 address is missing

error.unknown: An unknown error has occurred. See log for more information.
error.invalid_ip_address: Invalid IPv4 address, please enter valid IPv4 address.
error.not_discovered: Unable to find appliance at specified IPv4 address.
error.no_cloud: Unable to connect to Midea cloud API

abort.single_instance_allowed: Already defined a Midea app account. Only a single account is supported for dehumidifier integration.
